Program Counter
General Purpose Register 13 in Supervisor mode
General Purpose Register 14 in Supervisor mode
General Purpose Register 13 in Abort mode
General Purpose Register 14 in Abort mode
General Purpose Register 13 in Undefined mode
General Purpose Register 14 in Undefined mode
General Purpose Register 13 in IRQ mode
General Purpose Register 14 in IRQ
General Purpose Register 13 in Undefined mode
General Purpose Register 14 in Undefined mode
General Purpose Register 8 in FIQ mode
General Purpose Register 9 in FIQ mode
General Purpose Register 10 in FIQ mode
General Purpose Register 11 in FIQ mode
General Purpose Register 12 in FIQ mode
Stores the status of interrupt enables and critical processor status signals

bitfield.description: Stores bit 31 of the result of the instruction. In other words stores the sign of the number
Is set to 1 if the result of the operation is zero else stays 0
Stores the value of the carry bit if it occurred in an addition or the borrow bit in a subtraction. In a shift stores the last bit shifted out.
Set to 1 if an overflow occurred
Indicates whether an overflow or a saturation occurred in the enhanced DSP instructions
If set, IRQ is disabled. If cleared IRQ is allowed
If set, FIQ is disabled. If cleared FIQ is allowed
If set ARM is in Thumb mode
Mode of ARM

Set to 1 if an overflow occurred
Indicates whether an overflow or a saturation occurred in the enhanced DSP instructions
If set, IRQ is disabled. If cleared IRQ is allowed
If set, FIQ is disabled. If cleared FIQ is allowed
If set ARM is in Thumb mode
Mode of ARM
